title: QuickLlama: Door-to-door transfer from Lima Airport to Miraflores
description: Enjoy door-to door service with our shared transfers from Lima Airport direct to your accommodation in Miraflores. Just let us know what flight you‚Äôre on and we will be at the airport to meet you. If your flight is delayed, simply take the next provided shuttle at no extra cost.
all_descriptions: Enjoy door-to door service with our shared transfers from Lima Airport direct to your accommodation in Miraflores. Just let us know what flight you‚Äôre on and we will be at the airport to meet you. If your flight is delayed, simply take the next provided shuttle at no extra cost.

Enjoy a shared transfer in our new, modern and spacious vans from Lima Airport to your hotel or house in Miraflores: 
 ‚Ä¢ Door-to-door service
 ‚Ä¢ Free WiFi onboard
 ‚Ä¢ Air conditioning
 ‚Ä¢ Security cameras
 ‚Ä¢ GPS tracking
 ‚Ä¢ Professional drivers
 ‚Ä¢ Passengers are automatically covered by a private insurance policy¬†
 ‚Ä¢ Authorized to transport passengers nationwide by Peru's Ministry of Transportation and Communications

 Duration: The transfer from the Airport to Miraflores takes 1 hour on average. 

 Door to door: Our service is DOOR-to-DOOR, which means that we will take you to the door of any hotel or residential address in Central Miraflores. If your final destination is in a district different than Miraflores, we can take you to our central parking location in Miraflores Kennedy Park, and from there you can continue you journey to your final destination.
provider:

Terrible

They were late and marnated me on the parking for 20 min. It was terribly cold and i asked to let me know when driver arrive, while ill be waiting in terminal. Thaey were saying multiple times hes coming, almist there etc, but i have to go back to terminal every tome.
Finally i found driver but he didnt let me in, so i have to go back to tetminal again.

Just pay extra 5 usd and take uber, dont waste your time.
Written June 21, 2025

Not reliable!

Jun 2025 ‚Ä¢ Friends
DO NOT USE! they are unreliable. The posting offers various pick up times. We selected 10:20am on a SaturdayJune 21. They messaged back saying they‚Äôd pick us up on June 26th at 11:20am because they don't do pick ups at 10:20am on a Saturday. Once we got them to acknowledge they had the wrong date, we said we‚Äôd go with 11:20am pickup.
My gut told me to walk away but I didn‚Äôt. üòù
When we arrived in Lima we went to the designated pick up location at 11:05 and waited until 11:40 but they never showed up. Now they‚Äôre trying to say they were there. There was no purple van with a llama on it anywhere.
Don‚Äôt waste your time and frustration on this transport go with a more reliable driver.
Written June 21, 2025

Easy and reliable

Although we were a little hesitant, reviews of the other travelers convinced us to give this company a try. Do not regret it! They were easy to converse with pre-departure, arrived as scheduled, and dropped us off at the door of our hotel in Mira Flores. Would not hesitate to use them again.

Badly organised, disrespectful company

Mar 2025 ‚Ä¢ Solo
Very, very poor and risky service (only just managed to not miss my flight but at high expense).
The van never arrived for pickup from the hotel even after having confirmed the location twice via Whatsup days in advance.
Operators also having a disrespectful attitude following this serious issue.
Also refused refund.
A very stressful experience, would not recommend this company under any circumstance.
Written March 19, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
QLrev
Your hotel was in Barranco, where we currently don't go (as of March 2025). The person who made your reservation told us to pick you up in a different address in Miraflores and we went to pick you up there, on time, and were not able to find you.
Written March 25, 2025
This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Yokohama, Japan924 contributions

A cheaper shuttle than the bus from the airport, it will drop you off wherever you want to go.

Jan 2025 ‚Ä¢ Couples
They leave regularly in the morning, so if you book in advance, you don't have to pay, and they take you wherever you want to go in Miraflores. There is a little less security around the airport, so you can take this shuttle directly to Miraflores, which is safe, without leaving the airport grounds. Parking lots 1 and 2 behind the Costa Del Sol hotel stop in between. It's a shuttle, so you can be a few minutes late, but there's only one way in and out of the airport, so you know when you're coming in. The purple body won't be missed, so you don't have to stop in the parking lot to wait a little.
Automatically translated

Lousy service; irresponsible. No help from Trip Advisor

Oct 2024 ‚Ä¢ Couples
Terrible, terrible service. Never arrived. We searched all over.
They agreed driver had trouble.
Had to pay double to get to our hotel after hour wait. Now, they insist we pay for service never provided.
Horrible to deal with.
Avoid.
